data.title: Joyalukkas inaugurated another big showroom in Karnataka at Belgaum

data.text:
Belgaum, July 2014: Globally renowned jewellery retailer Joyalukkas, has continued its rapid growth plans for the year 2014 successfully. The world’s favourite jeweller has ventured into the dynamic city of Belgaum from 11th July, 2014 onwards. The signature Joyalukkas showroom in Belgaum was inaugurated by superstar Kiccha Sudeep in the presence of various dignitaries and VIP’s at a grand celebration during the opening. Every resident of Belgaum was personally invited for the celebration event, which showcased the world’s favourite jewellery shopping experience.

Joyalukkas Jewellery is a retail chain with 95 showrooms spread across 10 countries around the world and today is a part of the multi-billion dollar global conglomerate, which has various business interests. The Joyalukkas Group business interests today include Jewellery, Money Exchange, Fashion & Silks, Luxury Air Charter, Malls and Real Estate. Joyalukkas Jewellery is one of the world’s largest retail chains and is present in 10 countries which include Singapore, London, UAE, Malaysia, Saudi Arabia, Bahrain, Kuwait, Qatar, Oman & India. The jewellery retailer currently has a customer base of over 10 million customers worldwide and offers over 1 million choices in all types of jewellery at each of its showroom.

Said Joy Alukkas (Chairman & MD, Joyalukkas Group), “Our plan for 2014 includes strengthening our jewellery retail presence across various parts of India and opening our showrooms in cities and towns that we feel is ready for the Joyalukkas experience. For the sugar bowl of Karnataka i.e. Belgaum we have planned the sweetest and best experience in jewellery shopping.”

The Joyalukkas Belgaum showroom is located at Khade Bazar, and offers ample parking space and a very extensive shopping area. The showroom features dazzling collections and exquisite designs in gold, diamond, precious stones, platinum and pearl. The collections have a mix of traditional, ethno contemporary and international designs that have won the hearts and following of customers around the world.

Kiccha Sudeep, the brand ambassador for Joyalukkas, said, “I would like to extend my hearty congratulations and best wishes to Joyalukkas for their foray into Belgaum. I am delighted for the residents of Belgaum because they are soon going to experience the best in jewellery shopping.”

‘Trust’ is an integral part of the Joyalukkas offer which is managed through ensuring assurance and peace of mind to customers on their jewellery purchase. The retail chain manages this through strict adherence to quality and internationally accepted standards eg. 100% IGI certified diamonds, BIS Hallmark gold jewellery and PGI certified platinum jewellery etc. Joyalukkas, is also the first and only ISO 14001-2006 & ISO 9001-2008 certified jewellery retail chain,

“My vision for our jewellery business is to ‘ornament the world’ by offering customers the best mix of Price, Choice, Convenience and Service and me and my team work every single day to ensure this at all times. I’m sure Belgaum residents will love our dazzling jewellery collections and designs and the great experience we plan to offer them” added Joy Alukkas.

Other unique feature of Joyalukkas jewellery includes consumer friendly value added schemes like ‘Easy Gold schemes, Joyalukkas Golden Rewards Card, 100% buy back guarantee and more.

This international jewellery retail chain is also one of few retail chains to be recognised with many awards and accolades for its exceptional standards in jewellery retailing. It’s popular Chennai showroom has been recognised by the Limca Book of records for being the largest jewellery showroom in the world. Joyalukkas has also been awarded the prestigious ‘Superbrand’ status 5 years in a row in the UAE.
